name: Grindflow Management
tag_list: drupal, wordpress, ubercart, web-developement, management-soultions, web-consulting
overview:
Providers of technology, management, and sustainability solutions and services for small businesses. We specialize and are active members of the Drupal, Ubercart, and Wordpress communities.

It is our mission to advise and facilitate the integration of innovation, management science, and modern business practices into our web development at reasonable pricing. We accomplish this through expert consultation and an array of customized services.

We specialize in web development and custom internet solutions, and focus on superior quality, clear communication, and customer satisfaction. We are experts with content management solutions, e-commerce development, and state-of-the-art virtual cluster hosting. Our IT background and expertise is extensive and our business management competencies is what continues to separate us from our competition.
